name: Fire god's wrath
description:
The fire god, is ANGRY! You've entered the forbidden sanctuary hidden at the heart of the sacred volcano. Now, the wrath of Kauil is sending you a hot present... Hot and fast lava!

This is a platformer where you can't jump nor move normally. You can only move by shooting your coconut (rocket) launcher into your feet and swinging in your rope.
